set.name: Soul Calibur 3: Tale of Swords and Souls

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Gain 2 vitality. Only playable if your opponent dealt damage to you last turn. F Destroy 1 of your assets: Discard 2 cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 3 cards: Gain 3 vitality. F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Your attacks get +2 speed for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your weapon attack gets +1 damage. R Commit: Before you play an {All} card as a block, it gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you completely block an attack with this card, discard it from your card pool. Ivy E: If this attack deals damage, gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack deals damage, you discard X cards and gain X vitality. X equals the damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: After this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: After you play this card as a block, reduce the damage dealt by the blocked attack by X. X equals the total difficulty of this block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, discard any other card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you completely block an attack with this card, your opponent may discard the blocked attack from their card pool. E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you add this card to your momentum, you may discard 1 card from your hand and add this card to your hand instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: This attack gets +X speed and -X damage. Ivy E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, gain vitality equal to its Stun.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack deals damage, discard it from your card pool. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent may not block this attack with a card that shares any resource symbols with your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your {All} attack gets +2 speed. Ivy E: Your {All} attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Play the top card of your deck face down into your card pool as a normal mid attack with difficulty, speed, and damage of 3. This attack cannot be added to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 1 foundation: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may play that card as if it were in your hand or discard it. Only playable if the last card in your card pool is an attack that dealt damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Any attack gets -1 damage. You may play this ability any number of times per attack. E Commit: Reduce any attack's damage to 0. Your opponent may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool you may play any attack with a printed difficulty of 3 or less as a Reversal. F: Take 1 Reversal card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you play a Reversal, it gets -1 difficulty. E Commit: Any attack's damage and speed values are returned to their printed values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards. Then your opponent draws X cards. X may be any number of your choosing that is not greater than the number of foundations you have in play.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you've blocked an attack with this card, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: If this attack deals damage, play 1 attack card with a difficulty of X or less from your discard pile; no control check necessary (following All restrictions).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: The next attack you play this turn gets -X difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if you control a ready weapon asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: Choose 1 attack, which you could normally play, with speed equal to or less than this attack's speed in your discard pile and switch it with this attack. Play continues as if you had just played that attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your next card this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent blocks this attack, play 1 attack card with a printed difficulty of 3 or less from your discard pile, following All restrictions and paying All costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, each player discards 1 card. Kilik E: If this attack deals damage, each player discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, return this attack to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if there is another attack in your card pool. E: If this attack deals damage, play 1 low attack card with a damage of 3 or less from your discard pile; no control check necessary (following All restrictions).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check for a {Water} attack, that attack gets -2 difficulty, +2 speed, and -2 damage.

card.name: Secret Art of Ling-Sheng Su Style

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your Reversal gets +1 damage. Kilik E Commit: Discard 1 Reversal from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: You and your opponent each ready 2 foundations. Players may not ready any copies of this card with this ability. Kilik R Destroy this card: After you fail a control check that would end your Combat Phase, your Combat Phase does not end.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Attacks in your card pool do not add to the difficulty of any attacks you play for the rest of this turn. E: Your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Discard 1 {Air} card from your card pool. R: Before you play an attack as a Reversal, it gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent blocks 1 of your attacks, they take damage equal to half of that attack's damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your {Air} attack gets +1 speed. E Commit: Your {Air} attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this card as a block, play 1 attack card from your hand as a Reversal, following All restrictions and paying All costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 6 foundations: This attack is unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: After this attack is blocked, return it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, the next attack you play this turn gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have more cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you add this card to your momentum, discard it instead. Draw 1 card and discard 1 card. Only playable if you have played 2 or more attacks this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: The next attack you play this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Change the attack zone of this attack to high or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if you have played a Reversal this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if this attack was played as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +2 speed, and you may change its zone to any other.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this card: Your attack is unblockable. Only playable if you have 3 or more attacks in your card pool. Raphael E Commit, Discard 5 momentum: Your attack is unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Air} attack gets +3 speed. Raphael E Commit: Discard 1 card from your card pool. Only playable if this attack's speed is twice its damage or more.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays a block, take 1 Reversal from your discard pile and add it to your hand. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 2 foundations: Discard 1 attack from your card pool. R: After your opponent's attack deals damage, play 1 Reversal from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs. That Reversal gets +2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you fail to block an attack, you may play any attack card from your hand as a Reversal, following All restrictions and paying All costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area you get +1 hand size. R: Before you play a {Fire} attack, that attack gets -1 difficulty. Only playable if you have already played an attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After completely blocking with this card, you may play it as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack deals damage, you may immediately take 1 foundation with difficulty 3 or less from your hand and add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may only be played as a block or as a reversal. Setsuka E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have played another attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you play this card as a block, it gets +2 difficulty and Reversals you play get +2 damage for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your character card is Setsuka, this card may be used as a high block. E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you add this card to your momentum, discard it instead. You and your opponent each lose 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard the top 4 cards of your deck: This attack gets +2 speed. Setsuka E Discard the top 2 cards of your deck this attack gets +2 speed you may not play the first ability of this car. Only playable if you haven't played the first ability of this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if you have played another attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: As an additional cost to play this attack, discard 2 momentum. E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have fewer foundations in your staging area than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you add this card to your momentum, discard it and add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this card: Reveal your hand. Your attack gets +1 speed for each Reversal revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Fire} attack gets +1 speed. Setsuka E Commit: Your {Fire} Reversal gets +2 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum, commit 1 foundation: Play a {Water} attack card with a printed difficulty of 4 or less from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent fails a control check that ends their Combat Phase, you may play an attack from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Play 1 attack with a difficulty of 3 or less from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). E: Discard 1 Reversal card from your card pool. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Lose X vitality: Play 1 foundation with a difficulty of X or less from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Play 1 foundation card with difficulty X or less from your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). X equals the number of your committed foundations.

property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if your opponent has no ready foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next card you play this turn gets -4 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: Draw 1 card and then discard 1 card. Only playable if this attack's speed is greater than its damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed. Tira E: If the next attack you play this turn has a 'Tira' ability, it gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed and -6 damage. Tira E: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -3 speed and +1 damage.

property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: This attack gets +1 speed and -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack is blocked, add it to your momentum. Only playable if this attack's speed is higher than the blocking card's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if 3 or more attacks are in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have more total speed in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose 2 vitality: After your opponent blocks an attack, discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your card pool. Tira R Commit: When you are losing vitality to pay for an ability you control, lose 1 less.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After an attack you played as a Reversal deals damage, discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent would discard cards, but has no cards to discard, they lose 2 vitality for each card they would have discarded. E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, neither you nor your opponent may draw any cards during your next respective Ready Phases.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If your attack deals damage, your opponent discards X cards. X equals the number of cards remaining in your momentum. E Commit: Your {Death} attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit X foundations: Commit up to X of your opponent's ready foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Commit All character cards and foundations in play. Zasalamel F: Commit All foundations in play and your opponent's character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: All of your attacks get: 'E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card.' for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, each player may only ready 1 foundation during their Ready Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: X equals the total Powerful rating of All the Powerful attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: Your opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed damage of the attack immediately preceding this attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed speed of the most recent attack played into your card pool this turn besides this one.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 cards. Zasalamel E: If this attack deals damage your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Each player must commit 2 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this attack if you have at least 2 other attacks in your card pool. E Discard 3 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards X cards. X equals the number of your opponent's committed foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After 1 of your cards or abilities makes your opponent discard cards, your opponent must discard 1 additional card. Zasalamel F Commit: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck then either put them back on the top of your deck in any Order or discard them.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Powerful attack deals damage, your opponent loses vitality equal to its Powerful rating.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Take the top card from your deck and add it to your card pool face down: After you either deal damage with an attack or block an attack, commit any 1 foundation or asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: During your End Phase, after you and your opponent have cleared the cards from your card pools, choose a non-character card in your opponent's staging area and remove it from the game. This card becomes an exact copy of that card until the end of the game or this card is discarded or removed from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you discard momentum to pay for an ability, ready your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove this card from the game: Destroy 1 asset in any staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After 1 of your foundations is destroyed, take 1 foundation from your hand and add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this card is added to your staging area, gain 2 vitality. E: Your attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed.R Commit: After 1 of your attacks is blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Chaos} attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Rearrange your card pool, placing the cards into any Order. R Commit: After one of your attack deals more than 4 damage, place 1 card from your hand into your momentum and return the attack to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Evil} attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent takes the top 2 cards of their deck and adds them to their discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: Your opponent commits their character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 other foundation: After you fail a control check that would end your Combat Phase, your Combat Phase does not end.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this card: Choose 5 cards from your removed from the game pile and add them to the bottom of your deck in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and replace them in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Draw 2 cards then discard 3 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this card: Your attack gets +5 damage. Only playable if the attack has a printed damage of 5 or more.
